name: Villoid Store oEmbed
author: Wojciech Nowak

sections.description: It enables sharing via oEmbed for your villoid shop under store_name.villoid.com
sections.installation:
Installing “Villoid Store oEmbed” can be done either by searching for “Villoid Store oEmbed” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installing “Villoid Store oEmbed” can be done either by searching for “Villoid Store oEmbed” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

What is the plugin for?

It’s used to enable sharing from Villoid stores.

short_description: Share Products from Villoid Stores to your Wordpress blogs.
description: It enables sharing via oEmbed for your villoid shop under store_name.villoid.com
